sentences.sContent: The prisoners had been tortured and mutilated.
sentences.sCn: 犯人遭受了酷刑并被殴打致残。

sentences.sContent: extra protection for mental patients who might mutilate themselves
sentences.sCn: 对可能自残的精神病患者的额外保护

synos.tran: 切断，毁坏；使…残缺不全；使…支离破碎

words.tran: 切断；使残废（mutilate的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 切断，毁坏；使…残缺不全；使…支离破碎
trans.tranOther: to severely and violently damage someone’s body, especially by cutting or removing part of it
